22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: A woman made a voyage and vowed that she would fast one month if Allah made her reach her destination with peace and security. Allah made her reach her destination with security but she died before she could fast. Her daughter or sister (the narrator doubted) came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). So he commanded to fast on her behalf

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَضَاءِ النَّذْرِ عَنِ الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: Fulfilling A Vow On Behalf Of One Who Had Died
